title: Meeting Again
body:
Meeting Again

Evan was looking outside from the window of the plan. The plan took off just five minutes ago.

Evan never traveled through the plan even in his past life, so it was a completely new experience for him.

Even though this was a new experience and he wanted to enjoy it as much as possible, he wasn't able to enjoy it.

Even though he was looking outside from the window, he wasn't able to pay attention to it.

The reason for this was the passenger who was sitting with him.

"So you are going there for a vacation?" Jeffrey asked Evan.

"Yes, what about you guild master Jeffrey?" Evan stopped looking outside and asked.

The passenger who was sitting beside him was the guild master of 'Crimson Blade' which is a gold rank guild.

Evan knew his name because he also invited him to his guild.

"I have some work related to the guild," Jeffrey said while sighing, "man I also want to enjoy a vacation just like you"
